thread.title: RPT-BRIEF-Capita posts offer document containing full terms of Xchanging offer
thread.title_full: RPT-BRIEF-Capita posts offer document containing full terms of Xchanging offer | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: RPT-BRIEF-Capita posts offer document containing full terms of Xchanging offer
text:
(Repeats to additional clients)
Oct 19 (Reuters) - Capita Plc
* Offer document containing full terms of, and conditions to, offer and procedures for its acceptance is being published and posted today
* First closing date of offer is 16 November 2015 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
